node.title: "Riya, the fridge is empty.", Riya's mother said. "We only have one bottle of water left. Please go buy some water.”“Okay. I will buy three bottles of water”, Riya answered. Why is Riya going to buy water?
My name is Ram.I am eight years old.I am from Kolkata. How old is Ram? [[sound id=1]]
Priya is a young student.Ankur is a young student. Priya is pretty and smart.Ankur is tall and smart. Who is tall?
“Priya, do you want me to drive you to school?”, Priya's mother asked.“No, mum, I will take the train.” Priya said."Don’t you want to take the bus?”“No.” How will Priya go to school on Monday?
In the morning, Jaya has breakfast and goes to school.At noon, she has lunch.In the afternoon, she does her homework. When does Jaya go to school?
Priya is a young student.Ankur is a young student. Priya is pretty and smart.Ankur is tall and smart. Who is young?
In the morning, Jaya has breakfast and goes to school. At noon, she has lunch. In the afternoon, she does her homework. When does Jaya do her homework?
“Hi mum. I like football and I want to play it more often. I only play football two times a week, but I want to play it three times a week.” How often per week does Vijay want to play football?
